com.escape.games.api
Interface GameHost

public interface GameHost

Represents services outside the GL/AGE environment.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Summary
 void enableLoading(boolean enabled)
          Instruct game host to enable the "Loading" UI.

Method Detail

setText

void setText(int resid,
             java.lang.String text)
Display static text. This is invoke-safe.

Parameters:
resid - Resource ID of text location.
text - The text to display.

fadeInOutText

void fadeInOutText(int x,
                   int y,
                   int layout,
                   int color,
                   java.lang.String text)
Display dynamically-located text. This is invoke-safe.

Parameters:
x - Screen location X.
y - Screen location y.
layout - Resource ID of text layout.
color - Text color.
text - The text to display.

forceQuit

void forceQuit()
Instruct game host to force quit application.

enableStartGame

void enableStartGame(boolean enabled)
Instruct game host to enable the "Start Game" UI. This include start and play/pause commands.

Parameters:
enabled - true: enable; false: disable.

enableLoading

void enableLoading(boolean enabled)
Instruct game host to enable the "Loading" UI.

Parameters:
enabled - true: enable; false: disable.

gameIsOver

void gameIsOver()
Instruct game host that the game has ended. This notification is in addition to any calls to enableXXX() APIs.
